commit message: refactoring YubiKey stuff to own activity
add a widget for generating TOTP straight from homescreen
error if NFC is off and redirect to settings

Revert 'drop unused file'

This reverts commit 6e78a6a195c509a92664cba34e97f2994a717a38.
do finish() in onStop(), not onPause()
set release date for 0.0.1 and add changes for 0.0.2
change text size on the widget when it resizes
don't crash if we don't get a nfc adapter
only call finish() from onStop() if we're not waiting for a result
rework width stuff to be saved in preferences
use an older version of commons-codec, less cruft
better error if barcode scanner is not found
